Scripts.OnVerticalScroll: FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(self, offset, BROWSE_FILTER_HEIGHT, function() AuctionFrameFilters_Update() end);

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT"); GameTooltip:SetText(DISPLAY_ON_CHAR_TOOLTIP, nil, nil, nil, nil, true);
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT"); GameTooltip:SetText(AH_EXACT_MATCH_TOOLTIP, nil, nil, nil, nil, true);
